评论概述: Looks cheap! Poor quality! Save your money!
评论详情: I really wanted to love this Halloween top. Unfortunately, the look, feel and fit is much lower quality in person than the listing suggests. It looks like something you'd buy on Temu for $3.99. The shape is poorly tailored as Temu clothes tend to be (as if they didn't measure it on an actual human), and the print looks like a photo scan. The material is the type that will pill almost right away in the wash, and the fabric has an off-putting strong chemical smell. The fact that they normally charge  $29.99 for this is insane. I paid $9.99 on off-season sale and still feel like I got taken for way more than the garment is worth. Will be returning!
The material is polyester feeling, thin and not warm. Static makes the fabric cling which I don’t like. Also the black stripes are just slightly blueish. Wish it was cuter but I’ll wear it anyways
It’s like a pajama top…it’s a fun shirt
My daughter needed a shirt with strips for her Halloween costume. She love the color, comfort and fit she wears it all the time now. Easy to wash and is soft.
I absolutely love this top and does what it’s supposed to do. I like the length and color.

This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves it. It fits true to size and the color matches the picture. It comes out fine when washed in cold water; no shrinkage has been observed. It's long sleeves but light weight so she wears it almost year round.

评论概述: Definitely not red and black...red and navy
评论详情: A few things of note: 1. It's not red and black. **At all**. It's definitely red and navy blue. 2. The stripes do not line up on the side 3. I'm 5'5" and got an extra large (sized up) so it would be boxy and long. While it is a "boxy/ loose" fit, it came to my hip bones...it's not "thigh length" like the pictures. Obviously, the models are much shorter than me! 4. It's a comfortable shirt and it is cute, so I'm keeping it. Just know what you're getting...
